meta.content: Friend Public Schools - School Closures due to Coronavirus

Coronavirus COVID-19 - School Closure Information
As school communities within our state prepare for and respond to a COVID-19 outbreak, it is important that we stay informed. The NDE will add all submitted school and district closures to the COVID-19 Known School Closures page: https://www.education.ne.gov/ publichealth/covid19response/ . The page includes...

div.div: Partly sunny, with a high near 65. Windy, with a north northwest wind 23 to 28 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 40. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 15 to 20 mph becoming light northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 29 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 75. Northwest wind 5 to 7 mph becoming calm in the morning.

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

span.span: As school communities within our state prepare for and respond to a COVID-19 outbreak, it is important that we stay informed.

The NDE will add all submitted school and district closures to the COVID-19 Known School Closures page: https://www.education.ne.gov/publichealth/covid19response/. The page includes public, private, and parochial schools, and provides information on closure dates and local health department’s contact information.
We are continuously updating the COVID-19 FAQs page: https://www.education.ne.gov/publichealth/faq/. Please check back often to see the latest information.
Thank you for your continued service to students and schools.
